body.name: Battat- Wonder Wheels- Set of 6 Mini Toy Cars For Kids – Race Car, Truck, Taxi, Police Car, Retro Car, 4x4 – Pretend Play- Recyclable Materials - Mini Riders- 1 Year +
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs 35 mins
features: 6 Toy Cars: A set of 6 fun and colorful mini vehicles for any playful occasion!
Includes: A race car, pick-up truck, police car, taxi, vintage car, and a 4x4.
Easy-to-Hold: These chunky cars are easy for little hands to hold and play with.
Indoor & Outdoor: Take a ride through the living room or race in the backyard!
Developmental: Playing with these toy vehicles develops fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.
Eco-Friendly: Each toy car is 100% recyclable!
Worry-Free: all of Battat’s toys meet or exceed the highest safety standards.
Age: Recommended for toddlers 12 months and up.
body.description: Ride inside or roll outdoors with the Mini Vehicles from Wonder Wheels! This play set comes with 6 colorful cars - a race car, pick-up truck, police car, taxi, vintage car, and a 4x4. The realistic details and diversity of vehicles spark the imagination and encourage creative play. All of these vibrant toy cars are also tiny hands-friendly and can improve your little driver’s fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. Not to mention that this set of environmentally-friendly vehicles is entirely recyclable. So turn on the engine – it’s time to play!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wonder Wheels by Battat Wonder Wheels toys teach toddlers about everyday vehicles while encouraging young minds to dream big! No matter the job – major construction projects, daring rescues, or far off adventures – exploring with these wheels delivers loads of fun. Wonder Wheels: Mini Vehicles Hop into the driver’s seat and turn on the imagination. Will you keep the streets safe as you patrol in the police car? Will you give someone a ride in the taxi? Maybe zoom around the racetrack or go off-road in the 4x4? No matter what adventure you dream up, you’re sure to ride into a ton of fun with these colorful toy cars! 1 race car 1 police car 1 pick-up truck 1 taxi 1 retro car 1 4x4

Roll, Ride & Play Away! Sharing is Caring Because this playset comes with 6 different cars, your toddler can share the fun with friends and family! Whether it’s a playdate, a backyard barbeque, or just another afternoon with the siblings, your little driver can go on a rollin’ adventure with someone else – and improve their social skills while they’re at it! Learning Toys Turn playtime into a learning opportunity! As your child plays away with these toy cars, you can use this time to tell them about the real-life duties of each vehicle. A pick-up truck is used to transport materials, a 4x4 is made for riding on rough roads, a racer goes faster than any other car, and so on! Get Ready to Roll! Wonder Wheels pass the 'toddler test’ by being fun, dependable, and durable. We manufacture vehicles both big and small as well as take-apart toys with your little ones in mind – bright colors, moveable parts, realistic details, smooth edges, and safe materials. So climb in, buckle up, and get ready to roll with Wonder Wheels by Battat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These will last a lifetime
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For the price I wasn't sure what the quality would be like but these will last a lifetime. Our Grandson was 18 months when we got them and months later they still look brand new. They are the perfect size for his hands, no sharp edges and are so sturdy and well made. The colors are vibrant and help with learning. I love that they are of different styles and types of vehicles. The insides are very detailed, as in, seats, steering wheel, gear shifter, etc. They roll well on all surfaces. He just loves them! I feel these are not just for toddlers but that older kids would love them too. I know our grandson will be playing with them for years to come. You do get 6 of them which is wonderful. I would whole heartedly recommend these to any one who is looking for good quality and safe toy for your toddler, kids, grandkids or as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Battat makes EXCELLENT quality Toys!
reviews.reviewText: These small cars 🚙 are perfect for tiny hands that love all things that have wheels! They’re safe,Ecofriendly and durable! Battat is AWESOME💯👌✅

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect simple toy cars!
reviews.reviewText: I searched all over for simple realistic cars that weren’t pull back or that had lights or music. I wanted something that was just a car with wheels so my toddler could use her imagination. These cute little cars met my expectations perfectly and are very well made. They are Light weight but sturdy and very realistic looking. I love the colors and how real they look. My almost 2 year old loves them! There is a yellow taxi, blue police car, teal blue vintage car, red sports car, orange vintage pickup truck, and turquoise jeep.These cars were very reasonably priced (6 for $10). Very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Theses are awesome kid toys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are fantastic!!
reviews.reviewText: These came just like the picture shows. Our 15 month has had for a month now, he has not set them down. Great plastic cars. Hard to find quality plastic cars like these. We bought another box just in case he loses any of them, he wld have a fit lol. We did pick up the plane too, its bigger but a great addition. We will continue to buy these well made toys for sure.
